text: N’abantu bo mu bwoko bw’aba Thamudu, twaboherereje umuvandimwe wabo Swalehe, aravuga ati "Yemwe bantu banjye! Nimugaragire Allah! Nta yindi mana mufite ikwiye gusengwa itari we. Ni we wabahanze abakomoye mu gitaka anakibatuzaho. Bityo, nimumusabe imbabazi kandi munamwicuzeho, kuko muby’ukuri, Nyagasani wanjye ari hafi, kandi yakira (ubusabe)
